column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was going to visit my grandmother in Philadelphia for the weekend .
#id=2
#text=I had never been to Philadelphia before but was eager to try their legendary Philly Cheese Steak sandwiches .
#id=3
#text=The quickest way was to take the train there .
#id=4
#text=I got to the train station early in the morning and tried to figure out how to get there .
#id=5
#text=I was a little confused so I asked one of the customer service representatives in the ticket booth .
#id=6
#text=The woman told me I could to take the 8:05 train and that it would be leaving from Gate F .
#id=7
#text=She said that I could buy the tickets from her or from a machine .
#id=8
#text=I decided to buy it from her and it cost $ 75 dollars .
#id=9
#text=I paid in cash and got my ticket .
#text=the train was leaving in ten minutes and the gate had been announced so i rushed to the gate .
#text=I got there with time to spare and found a seat in the back .
#text=About an hour later i was in Philadelphia and was very excited .
